entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as 'Harry wherever you are' in a message on the sign. The text describes him as someone who is being supported by others.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A person who is with Harry and expresses indignation at the messages on the sign. She is described as saying 'They shouldn’t have written on the sign!'
